publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5145 Stuart McMillan: World Drumming Championships—That the Parliament congratulates Barry Wilson, leading drummer of the Scottish Power Pipe Band, for winning his third consecutive title as World Solo Drumming Champion on 24 October 2009 and notes that Barry won by gaining the most aggregate points over the March, Strathspey and Reel and Hornpipe and Jig events.

S3M-5145 Stuart McMillan: World Drumming Championships—That the Parliament congratulates Barry Wilson, leading drummer of the Scottish Power Pipe Band, for winning his third consecutive title as World Solo Drumming Champion on 24 October 2009 and notes that Barry won by gaining the most aggregate points over the March, Strathspey and Reel and Hornpipe and Jig events.
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Rob Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Jamie McGrigor*, Willie Coffey*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Ken Macintosh*, Elaine Smith*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Hugh Henry*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Gil Paterson*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Maureen Watt*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Bob Doris*
S3M-5145 World Drumming Championships (lodged on 5 November 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
